bug.question: I wiggle and crawl! I like to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I am small and not a dog or cat.
🌱 I like to eat plants.
🐌 I move very slowly.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. I like to eat crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am a very small insect
🧺 I live in groups with my family
🚶 I have lots of legs to help me move

bug.question: I fly in the sky. I am black and yellow. I make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I buzz around and make a yummy treat
💛 I have stripes and can sting
🌻 I like to fly near flowers

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a very lucky bug
🔴 I have spots on my body
🍃 I like to land on leaves

bug.question: I jump very high. I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I make chirping sounds.
🌿 I like to live in grassy areas
💚 My colour helps me hide.

bug.question: I fly at night. I am attracted to light. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I only come out when it is dark.
💡 I am a type of insect that is attracted to bright lights.
🦋 People often think of me as being a butterfly.

bug.question: I make a sticky web. I catch bugs for dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have eight legs.
🕸️ I use my silk to create a trap.
🪰 Flies get stuck on my home.

bug.question: I have colorful wings. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of beauty and transformation.
🌈 I am brightly colored.
🐛 I used to crawl on the ground before I could fly.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. I can be seen at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am a bug that lights up!
🔦 My light helps me find other bugs
🌃 I fly around in the dark

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound. I bite and drink blood. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I am an insect known for my annoying bite.
🚁 I make a buzzing sound.
💉 I bite people and sometimes animals.

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow, and I shine so bright, I give you warmth and fill the day with light. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am in the sky during the day.
🔥 I am very hot!
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and white, and I come out at night. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a little bite! What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I am in the sky when it's dark.
🐺 Some animals howl at me!
🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I twinkle and shine, far, far away. You see me at night, when you look up to play. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am small and sparkly.
⚫ I am in the sky when the sun goes down.
🌠 You can wish upon me!

cosmos.question: I am a big ball, where we live and play. I have land and water, every single day. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 This is where your house is!
💧 I have oceans and rivers.
🌎 I am one of many planets.

cosmos.question: I go around and around the Earth each night. I am a friend to the Sun but only come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I am like a satellite.
🌝 I reflect the sun's light.
🌚 Sometimes I am big and round, sometimes a sliver.

cosmos.question: I'm a big group of stars, all shining together. I make pictures in the sky, in any weather! What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 Many stars live here.
🎨 You can use your imagination to see things.
🐻 Some are named after animals, like a bear.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, a planet so grand. Maybe one day, you'll walk on my land! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me.
🔴 My color is like rust.
🍫 Some people name candy bars after me.

cosmos.question: I am very big and made of gas with colorful bands, a big red spot goes round and round, what planet am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a huge storm.
🪐 I am the biggest planet.
🌀 I am known for my swirling atmosphere.

cosmos.question: I have rings around me, so pretty and bright, made of ice and rocks, shining in the night. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 I have many shiny things around me.
🧊 My rings are made of small pieces.
🪐 I am not the only planet with rings, but mine are the biggest and brightest.

cosmos.question: I am a home for lots of stars, and dust, and gas, a giant spinning place, a cosmic mass! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am big and swirly.
🌌 The Milky Way is one of us.
✨ I'm made up of billions of stars.
